    • Uses of MutationInterface in optimization.stochastic.operators

      Subinterfaces of MutationInterface in optimization.stochastic.operators 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  HeterogenousMutationInterface
      This interface extends the basic mutation interface in that it supports heterogenous mutations rates where each feature can mutate at a different rate.
      interface  TwoDevsMutationInterface
      This interface sets up the methods for handling both large and small mutations simultaneously.

    • Uses of MutationInterface in optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats

      Classes in optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats that implement MutationInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeterogenousFloatMutator
      Heterogenous float mutator, mutating float features in such a way that different features have different mutations rates.
      class  HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator
      Heterogenous float mutator where each feature has a separate probability of mutating by a small or a large amount.
      class  HomogenousFloatMutator
      Homogenous float mutator that mutates the values of float features in data points.
      class  HomogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator
      A class that implements the homogenous two deviations float mutator.
      class  PointSetTwoDevMutation
      Mutation class for point set configurations.
